ModMetaData.name: Bonded Animals RNG
ModMetaData.author: Scurvyez
ModMetaData.description:
Discord: steveo.o steam: Scurvyez
This mod adds a little variety to the animals of your colony. When an animal becomes bonded to a colonist, said animal will gain a random skill alteration. These can be either buffs or debuffs and are permanent. May the odds be ever in your favor.
